casebody.data:
Refeal AHARON, Defendant Below, Appellant,
v.
Daniel KLEINBERG, Tomer Herzon, Saturn Partners Limited Partship II, and Raki Engineering and Infrastructures Ltd., Plaintiffs Below, Appellees. No. 427, 2018 Supreme Court of Delaware. Submitted: September 11, 2018
Decided: September 25, 2018

REFUSED.
